full_summary:
### NPP - Procurement Specialist Level 3 (Senior)
#### **Government of Canada Tender Notice**

**Reference:** CB-21-91112754
**Amendment:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** CIC-155740
**Publication Date:** 2023-07-21
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-15T15:00:00 (Expired)
**Procurement Category:** SRV

The Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) invites qualified suppliers to respond to a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of services by a Senior Procurement Specialist.

**Project Description:**
The IRCC requires the services of one (1) Senior Procurement Specialist to support the VAC Contract Renewal Project in its project responsibilities throughout the planning, design, pre-implementation, and implementation stages of the Procurement process.

**Contract Duration:**
The proposed period of contract shall be from contract award to one (1) year later and one (1) option year of one (1) year.

**Eligibility:**
The proposal is open to all potential suppliers. There are no individual eligibility requirements listed, but all interested suppliers should review the tender documents carefully.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions:**
The contract will be administered by the Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada's (IRCC) office in Gatineau, Quebec.

**Contact:**
If you have any questions about this tender, please contact Steven French at IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca | (613) 293-2493.

**Tender Documents:**
The tender documents can be accessed through the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files
